product_name: The North Face Salathe Fleece Jacket - Men's
long_description: Wear The North Face Salathe fleece jacket on the approach or as a layer it during cold weather for extra warmth. Offering insulation without bulkiness, Polartec(R) Classic 100 microfleece is warm, soft, compressible and durable. Features hem drawcord and 2 zip hand pockets. Standard fit ensures freedom of motion. Salathe jacket zips into compatible garments from The North Face (other garments not included).
short_description: Wear The North Face Salathe fleece jacket on the approach or as a layer it during cold weather for extra warmth.
